summary: VEHICLE SUDDENLY GOES INTO LIMP MODE AND ALMOST STALLS OUT. WARNING LIGHTS AND SOUNDS ALERT DRIVER THAT ENGINE TEMP IS DANGEROUSLY HIGH AND TO PULL OVER SAFELY.  THIS HAS HAPPENED 4 TIMES IN LAST YEAR. EACH TIME IT WAS TOWED TO MECHANIC AND SOMETHING COOLANT RELATED HAS BEEN REPLACED. HOSES, THERMOSTAT, SENSORS, COOLANT SOLENOID. ONCE AGAIN HERE WE ARE AND IT HAS HAPPENED AGAIN. I HAD TO TRY AND SAFELY PULL OFF THE ROAD WITH NO POWER AND HESITATION ON A 65MPH HIGHWAY.
